meanings.definition: Members of a congress, especially those who are elected to represent a specific constituency.
meanings.sent1: The congresspeople gathered to discuss new laws for our town.
meanings.sent2: The congresspeople voted on the bill during the session.
meanings.sent3: The congresspeople had a pizza party after a long day of debates.
meanings.sent4: The congresspeople are the puzzle pieces that fit together to create a functioning government.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the faces of the congresspeople who visited our school.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who make up a legislative body, such as the United States Congress.
meanings.sent1: The congresspeople in Washington D.C. work hard to represent their states.
meanings.sent2: The congresspeople passed a new law to protect the environment.
meanings.sent3: The congresspeople had a friendly race to see who could sign the most papers first.
meanings.sent4: The congresspeople are the gears that keep the country running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The congresspeople's voices echoed through the grand halls of the Capitol building.
